åšç‰©é¦†åç§°ï¼š{Museum Name}

Prompts:

Present an exquisite, miniature 3D cartoon-style scene of {User Input: Museum Name}, clearly viewed from a 45Â° top-down perspective.

â€‹Central Architecture:

Place the museum's most absolutely recognizable architectural landmark (e.g., the Glass Pyramid for the Louvre, the Greek Revival facade for the British Museum, or the Winter Palace for the Hermitage) prominently at the center. The architectural style must be distinct and accurate to the institution.

â€‹Exclusive Collection Elements (Replace Generic Items):

Strictly minimize generic travel clichÃ©s (such as tour buses, cameras, or generic tickets). Instead, surround the central building with high-fidelity, miniature replicas of the museum's most precious collections:

â€‹Iconic Antiquities & Artifacts: Scattered around are detailed models of specific historical treasures housed within this museum (e.g., the Rosetta Stone, Egyptian Sarcophagi, ancient pottery, royal jewelry, or samurai armor).

â€‹Masterpiece Sculptures: Represent the museum's famous three-dimensional art NOT as living characters, but strictly as miniature marble statues, bronze busts, or stone carvings (e.g., The Thinker, Venus de Milo, or Discobolus) positioned artistically around the base.

â€‹Fine Art Highlights: Distinct, recognizable miniature framed oil paintings or tapestries that are the "crown jewels" of this specific museum (e.g., a tiny Mona Lisa, Starry Night, or Great Wave off Kanagawa), displayed on elegant easels or leaning against the walls.

â€‹Visual Style & Rendering:

Rendered with Cinema 4D, the modeling should be refined, smoothly rounded, and rich in texture, accurately capturing realistic PBR materials (polished marble floors, gold leaf frames, velvet ropes, glass display cases, aged sandstone). Lighting should simulate a mix of natural skylight and dramatic gallery spotlighting, creating a grand, curated, and artistic ambiance.

â€‹Typography & Layout:

Creatively integrate the museum's basic information into the scene with a clean, minimalist layout on a solid-color background.

â€‹Top-Center: Display the Museum Name in a large, serif or sans-serif font (matching the museum's actual branding style).

â€‹Sub-text: Below the name, display the Founding Year | City, Country in a medium, elegant font.
â€‹Include a subtle, high-quality rendering of the museum's logo or crest.
â€‹Parameters:

â€‹Aspect Ratio: 1:1

â€‹Museum Name: The Louvre Museum

â€‹Note to Model: Ensure the "Specific Artifacts" generated are actual famous holdings of the named museum.
